body.description: Features Enlarge Hi-Def Yourself. Logitech HD Webcam C270—making HD video calling simple. Say it bigger. Say it better. High definition 720p video in widescreen for picture quality that's simply amazing. Self-expression knows no bounds. It's not just about video calls anymore. Video blog, stream, share, rant, rap, sing and dance with ease. Plus it works seamlessly with your favorite applications. The term 'webcam' doesn't quite do it justice. HD Webcam C270 Noteworthy Features • Fluid HD 720p video calling and recording in 16:9 widescreen • Crisp 3 MP photos • Easy HD video calling on Skype, Windows Live Messenger and Logitech Vid HD • Automatic light correction • Integrated noise-cancelling microphone Enlarge Stay connected in widescreen HD 720p The smoothest HD video calls with more video frames per second than other HD webcams Show friends more of you in 16:9 widescreen Easy to stream video, share your recorded videos or vblog Enlarge Video calling made easy Enjoy fluid HD 720p calls on Skype, Windows Live Messenger and Logitech Vid HD—the free, fast and fast easy way to see your loved ones face-to-face. Learn more Enlarge Simple to snap and send photos Take vibrant 3-megapixel snapshots with just one click. Enlarge Comes with good lighting With automatic light correction, you'll get the best possible image—even if you make a video call in dim light. Enlarge Sound clear even in a noisy room The built-in mic reduces background noise so the person you're calling hears you loud and clear. Logitech Fluid Crystal Technology Now it's in every Logitech webcam, giving you: Smoother video motion, without annoying choppiness, in real-world conditions Sharper video with more true-to-life detail Richer, more natural colors Clearer sound Learn more Enlarge Sleek universal design Clips securely to any laptop or LCD monitor Flat panel design looks great with the latest laptop styles Compatibility Package Contents Webcam with 5-foot cable Logitech webcam software with Logitech Vid HD User documentation 2-year limited hardware warranty Works with Windows XP (SP2 or higher), Windows Vista or Windows 7 (32-bit or 64-bit)Basic requirements: 1 GHz 512 MB RAM or more 200 MB hard drive space Internet connection USB 1.1 port (2.0 recommended) For HD 720p video calling on Logitech Vid HD and HD video recording: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GB RAM 200 MB hard drive space USB 2.0 port 1 Mbps upload speed or higher 1280 x 720 screen resolution For other video-calling clients, please check the recommended Compare Which Logitech HD Webcam is right for you? Good Better Best Good Better Best What to look for HD Webcam C270 HD Webcam C310 HD Webcam C525 Webcam Pro 9000 HD Webcam C615 HD Pro Webcam C910 Video + Photo Quality HD resolution HD 720p HD 720p HD 720p HD 720p Full HD 1080p Full HD 1080p 16:9 widescreen Photo resolution 3MP 5MP 8MP 8MP 8MP 10MP Focus type Always focused* Always focused* Auto Focus Autofocus Autofocus Autofocus Lens type Plastic lens Plastic lens Plastic lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens Auto light correction Audio Quality Built-in mic with noise cancellation Dual mics for stereo audio Special Features 1-click HD upload to Facebook, Twitter and YouTube** Video effects Standard Premium Premium Premium Premium 360-degree rotational camera Portable design Fold-and-go webcam Fold-and-go webcam Tripod Ready Base Face Tracking (PC only) Compatibility Works with Windows XP, Vista, 7 Works with Mac OS X 10.5 or higher * 40 cm and beyond.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Logitech C270 HD Webcam Smile in HD Say hi to friends and family near and far with the real you. C270 shows you at your best in clear, smooth, beautiful HD video—and in your best light thanks to Logitech smart light correction.

Say Hi in High-Def Look your best on video calls in beautiful widescreen HD 720p. Built-in mic with noise reduction It gives you clear conversations without annoying background noise. Auto light correction Even if you make a video call in dim or poorly backlit settings, the camera will automatically adjust to produce the best possible image. Skype friendly Works with Skype, Google Hangouts, Yahoo! Messenger, and other popular video calling applications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value; great quality for its price point
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Cost, picture quality, ease of use. Plug-and-play with excellent picture quality.Cons: Picture quality is 720p and not 1080p, but this is hardly noticeable for most users. Can't beat the quality for the price point compared to other webcams. The mount is also not particularly secure when clipped to the top of your monitor, but not much different than with other webcams.Review: For the price point, it's hard to beat this camera. It was plug-and-play right out of the box, and has functioned excellently with zero issues or disadvantages while participating extensively in numerous Zoom meetings. It has very effective auto-focus that intuitively focuses on your face. Be aware that this auto-focus will automatically focus on the face of any newcomer who walks into the room within the scope of the camera though. If you're working from home or attending class in an area where people may be coming through the room next to your or behind you, the camera will focus on them when they come in range.This camera is only 720p and not 1080p, but this is not likely going to be noticed by most users if you're using this to attend Zoom meetings and participate in work or school online. The picture quality is crisp. The camera's mounting clip doesn't seem particularly secure or stable and it's easy to move the camera around. If you're not bumping into your monitor though, this shouldn't be much of an issue. It doesn't seem particularly worse than the mounting situation associated with other webcams. This webcam provides excellent quality and is a fantastic value at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Cheap Camera for Zoom
reviews.reviewText: Needed an upgrade from my Laptop Camera but didn't want to spend a lot of Money. Using it to teach classes over Zoom, Picture quality is great and Mic is excellent. Nothing fancy just a good piece of basic equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, fixed focus, narrow angle video cam.
reviews.reviewText: I needed an inexpensive, simple video cam for my daughter to make Zoom calls on her Chromebox, and this cam filled the bill.Specs say the camera is fixed focus but the image looks good within a short or long arm’s length from the monitor.I like the narrow field of view so the user fills most of the field of view - many cameras show mostly the background. If you move around a lot, you may want a different cam and wider FOV. Some small “fingers” and gravity hold the camera on the top of the monitor. The camera can be adjusted up or down about 20-30 degrees. A microphone is built into the camera and gives decent sound. Bottom line: excellent value If all you need is a basic camera and microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Job Done - Logitech Brio 101 Webcam Review
reviews.reviewText: Crystal Clear Excellence - Logitech Brio 101 Webcam ReviewI recently purchased the Logitech Brio 101, and I am beyond impressed with its price to performance ratio.1. Stunning 1080p HD Clarity:The Brio 101's 1080p HD resolution delivers enough clarity for meetings. The details are sharp, and the colors are true to life, providing a professional touch to my video presentations.2. Intelligent Autofocus:The autofocus feature is incredibly fast and accurate. Whether I'm moving around or sitting still, the Brio 101 keeps me in sharp focus.3. Great Microphone:The microphone is surprisingly good for being built-in and is perfectly adequate for meetings and discord.4. Easy to Use and Set Up:Setting up the Brio 101 is a breeze. It's plug-and-play simplicity at its finest. The included privacy shutter is a nice touch for added security when the camera is not in use. The overall design is sleek and modern, adding a touch of sophistication to my workspace.5. Compatibility Galore:The Brio 101 is compatible with a wide range of video conferencing and streaming platforms. Whether I'm on Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Skype, or broadcasting on Twitch, the Brio 101 seamlessly integrates with my favorite apps.In conclusion, the Logitech Brio 101 is a webcam that exceeds expectations. Its 1080p clarity, versatile features, and user-friendly design make it a standout choice for anyone looking for a "good enough" quality webcam on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low Price Option for Remote 3D Print Monitoring - Octolapse
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have a Logitech c920 for work that I absolutely love but I was wanting to add something to my 3D Printers for remote monitoring and timelapses that balanced simple, low cost, and good quality. After looking around the internet, this camera had a strong "starter" consensus so I chose to get one for my new setup. I have always had good luck with Logitech products so I wasn't too worried about the quality.This is a pretty standard webcam. You get it out, plug it into a usb, and you are on your way. Everything worked fine for my application but I was having some issues with the focus. This camera did not have any manual focus options so I had to search for a solution. Luckily, since this is for 3D printing, someone had created a manual focusing adapter that I was able to install on the camera to give it the additional features that I was looking for in order to create my timelapses. Once installed, this has been a dream.Overall, if you are looking for a first webcam for monitoring your 3D Printer, this is your choice. I have it up and running on Octolapse and have had zero issues with the camera.My biggest issue with the camera is that it has 720p resolution, but that's what you kind of get at this price point and I knew that going into it. At some point, I will probably upgrade to a higher resolution option but this will hold a spot in my 3D printer lineup for as long as its working, which should be a very long time!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and priced right
reviews.reviewText: Used on Zoom. Clear picture and easy to mount.

Bought the Logitech Brio 101 for a better experience with my three-screen setup, and it's perfect! No more relying on the laptop camera. I love how it allows me to focus on my main screen. The default settings work great for me, so no need for adjustments. The sliding privacy shutter is a big plus – super convenient and great for privacy, especially with the indicator light showing when the camera is in use.The built-in mic, while convenient, may not offer the best sound quality compared to external options. Personnally, I disabled the built-in mic to use my microphone. Highly recommend for anyone with a similar setup!Additionnally, It's worth noting that the 1080p resolution is just alright. It provides decent quality for meetings and streaming, which works fine for everyday use. However, if you're looking for that high-end, professional YouTube video quality, this might not hit the mark. It's more suited for standard video calls rather than for content creators seeking exceptional video clarity.

I use the camera everyday for teams and zoom and it works great! I like that you can tilt it up and down to get the perfect angle. I've never used the mic though.4 stars because it blocks a small portion of the top of my screen. It's a bit annoying so I'll eventually have to add some padding to the mount.
Got this for work calls, it’s great!
It's good. People can see me.
Paid 39.99 for these.Fantastic price and quality. I love they have a camera cover as well.Plug and play!
